posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge Bid Mcphee SGC
posts.post_content:
Im looking to Sell my Mcphee. Please PM me offers. The "A" was given due to slight trimming.

Looks like you stand to make a tidy profit on what you purchaed it for ;) (insert humor here)

Josh, does the 75 cents included S/H and insurance?   How much is the card?

Thanks!

Thanks![/QUOTE]

The $.75 will cover the shipping and insurance. Taking offers on the card.
